column4: Hi guys! Q: pon dsl-provider works except if an application is idling the connection drops _just_ for that application. How can i make it stay up no matter the activity? (irc client doesnt disconnect as it is active) thanks

Hi guys! Q: pon dsl-provider works except if an application is idling the connection drops _just_ for that application. How can i make it stay up no matter the activity? (irc client doesnt disconnect as it is active) thanks
that could be your routers time-out of TCP-connections, if you have one?
with router i am all right
